protocol_name: Extraction and detection of free-gossypol in cottonseed samples
protocol_name_html: Extraction and detection of free-gossypol in cottonseed samples
description: This simple and rapid chromatographic detection method was developed and validated in order to accurately quantify trace levels of free gossypol in different cotton materials, including cottonseed, cottonseed cake and cottonseed cake treated with macrofungi.
before_start: Ice is needed for the sonicate step
protocol_affiliation: Universidade Federal da Bahia,Universidade de Brasilia,Embrapa Agroenergia
manuscript_citation: Conceição AA, Neto CBS, Ribeiro JAdA, Siqueira FGd, Miller RNG, Mendonça S (2018) Development of an RP-UHPLC-PDA method for quantification of free gossypol in cottonseed cake and fungal-treated cottonseed cake. PLoS ONE 13(5): e0196164. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196164
authors: Aparecido Almeida Conceição,Clemente Batista Soares Neto,José Antônio de Aquino Ribeiro,Felix Gonçalves de Siqueira,Robert Neil Gerard Miller,Simone Mendonça
guidelines: Column and equipment used to develop this method was KINETEX® column and a Waters ACQUITY UPLC H-Class system, respectively.

components.data: Dry the cottonseed sample at 40 °C for 24 hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dry the cottonseed sample at 40 °C for 24 hours.

source_data.annotation: This protocol was tested with samples from cottonseed with linter, cottonseed without linter, cottonseed cake and cottonseed cake treated wuith basidiomycetes fungi.

components.data: The sample should be very well dried in order to proceed to the next step
components.name: Expected result

source_data.result: The sample should be very well dried in order to proceed to the next step

components.data: Grind the dry sample to form a fine powder with an ultra centrifugal mill (0.5 mm)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Grind the dry sample to form a fine powder with an ultra centrifugal mill (0.5 mm)

components.data: Weight 1 gram of the powdered sample into a 15mL plastic centrifuge tube with screw.

source_data.description: Weight 1 gram of the powdered sample into a 15mL plastic centrifuge tube with screw.

components.data: Add 3 mL of ultrapure water into the tube.

components.data: Ultra-sonicate for 5 minutes using ice in the sonicator.

components.data: Centrifuge the tubes at 9000 rpm for 5 minutes at 8 °C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge the tubes at 9000 rpm for 5 minutes at 8 °C.

components.data: Transfer 2 mL of the supernatant to 15 mL centrifuge tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 2 mL of the supernatant to 15 mL centrifuge tube.

components.data: Evaporate the solvent in a speed vacuum at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Evaporate the solvent in a speed vacuum at room temperature.

All solvent must be evaporated

 

The temperature should not be over 35ºC
source_data.thread_text:
All solvent must be evaporated

 

The temperature should not be over 35ºC
source_data.body:
All solvent must be evaporated

 

The temperature should not be over 35ºC

components.data: Resuspend the residue with 200 µL of 70% acetone.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the residue with 200 µL of 70% acetone.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 13 of Extraction and detection of free-gossypol in cottonseed samples
source_data.protocol_name: Extraction and detection of free-gossypol in cottonseed samples
source_data.protocol_name_html: Extraction and detection of free-gossypol in cottonseed samples
source_data.annotation:
Prepare 70% acetone using ultrapure water.

 

The pellet remaining in the tube must be entirely suspended with the solvent.
source_data.thread_text:
Prepare 70% acetone using ultrapure water.

 

The pellet remaining in the tube must be entirely suspended with the solvent.
source_data.body:
Prepare 70% acetone using ultrapure water.

 

The pellet remaining in the tube must be entirely suspended with the solvent.

components.data: Transfer the solution to a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the solution to a 1.5 mL Eppendorf tube.

components.data: Centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 10 minutes at 8 °C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 10 minutes at 8 °C.

components.data: Transfer the supernatant to vial.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the supernatant to vial.

components.data: Set a reversed phase C18 column (100 x 2.1 mm, 2.6 µm) in a UHPLC equipped with a photodiode array (PDA).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set a reversed phase C18 column (100 x 2.1 mm, 2.6 µm) in a UHPLC equipped with a photodiode array (PDA).

components.data: Detection protocol
components.name: Section

components.data: Set column temperature to 35 °C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set column temperature to 35 °C.

components.data: Use methanol as organic solvent (A) and 0.1% TFA in water as aqueous solvent (B) for mobile phase constituents.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Use methanol as organic solvent (A) and 0.1% TFA in water as aqueous solvent (B) for mobile phase constituents.

components.data: Set elution as gradient. The elution starts with 60% of A, changing linearly to 100% of A , it is reached at 8 minutes and maintained until 10 minutes. After this, the mobile phase suddenly changes to 60% of A, maintaining this isocratic flow till the end of run at 14 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set elution as gradient. The elution starts with 60% of A, changing linearly to 100% of A , it is reached at 8 minutes and maintained until 10 minutes. After this, the mobile phase suddenly changes to 60% of A, maintaining this isocratic flow till the end of run at 14 minutes.

components.data: Set the sample manage to 8 °C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set the sample manage to 8 °C.

components.data: Set the PDA monitoring to 254 nm.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Set the PDA monitoring to 254 nm.

components.data: Inject 2 µl of the sample.

components.data: The gossypol peak should appear at 6.3 minutes using Empower software for analysis of chromatogram
components.name: Expected result

components.data: Set the flow rate to 0.4 mL/min.
components.name: Description
